Knight of the Gate019833nwdc1z9jg9c811pixakxle3klfn0ncm1523072014-07-11T01:03:03ZThe Dragon Demands5014364'''Knight of the Gate''' is the title given to the commander of the [[Bloody Gate]], the castle that safeguards the eastern roadway into the [[Vale of Arryn]]. Traditionally, he asks the question, "Who would pass the Bloody Gate?" to all who would pass through.

The current Knight of the Gate is Ser [[Donnel Waynwood]].
